name: none
description: This effect is empty. It doesn't even have 'splash' or evolve...

name: change_diplomacy
description: This effect can be used to change the diplomacy stance of the source players with the target player.
It does NOT change the stance both ways.

attributes.name: diplomacy
attributes.description: The new diplomacy state. (ALLY / NEUTRAL / ENEMY)

attributes.name: source_player
attributes.description: The player who's stance to another player will be changed

attributes.name: target_player
attributes.description: The player who's stance to change for the source player

name: research_technology
description: This effect can be used to automatically research a technology for the specified player

attributes.name: source_player
attributes.description: The player to research the technology for

attributes.name: technology
attributes.description: The technology to research for the specified player

attributes.name: force_research_technology
description: If enabled, the technology is researched even if the player's civilization does not have access to it.
For example, it can be used to research Paladin for the Aztec civilization.
